duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform security analysis, documentation authoring, and source code review of cryptographic IT products.
Conduct operational testing, presentations, workshops, and report writing related to evaluation of cryptographic IT products.
Maintain and improve technical knowledge, perform status reporting, and perform related audit-related tasks.
Presentations and workshops with customers, cryptographic module design specification review, and authoring of security documentation.
Execution of source code test plans, operational test plans, and reporting observed test results.
Conduct testing activities in accordance with standards and methodologies related to FIPS 140 validation, consulting senior engineers as applicable on testing matters.
Develop creative solutions, work successfully in a team environment, and handle other testing activities as required.

skills.skill: Wireless Communication Protocols (e.g., Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, NFC)
IT Test Tools and Techniques (e.g., Wireshark)
CVP Tester Certification (or prior FIPS testing experience)

education_certification.credential: Post-secondary program in IT security, computer science, or engineering (Bachelor's degree preferred)
